short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud-based Applicant Tracking System - One platform to manage your human resources and customers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Vultus LinkedIn chrome extension is used to extract information from LinkedIn portal. Easily add candidates from LinkedIn. Click the Vultus icon to parse candidate information from web pages.
